NPC.name: black grief
NPC.description: The insectoids carapace is pitch black, and separated in enough places that it looks like it could fold in half. It stands eight feet tall, most of which is its four legs, and the legs themselves are still as thick as a mans arm, and end in beetle like hooked feet. A long tail extends out behind its body like the demented hybrid of a dragonfly and a wasp. Moving your eyes towards the front of its body you see a pair of almost mantid like fore-limbs, each with a thick scything claw. Then you reach its head, a pair of large, deep-purple compound eyes sit atop it on either side, and on the front it almost has a face, with two small non-compound eyes of the same shade where they would be on a normal face, but the mouth stretches open to reveal a set of four large inward curved fangs, and the lower jaw splits open, stretching its maw out horizontally as well. You look into its eyes, and you see hunger, but behind that, you see cruelty, this thing doesn't just want to eat, it wants to cause harm.
